title: State v. Keith Davis, Jr. – Addendum 4 – In Sickness and In Health
description:
May 16, 2019 / Susan chats about the fourth episode of our Keith Davis Jr. series with host Amelia McDonell-Parry, Keith's wife Kelly Davis, and Team Keith member Peggy Amacker Murphy -- who also officiated Keith and Kelly's wedding! Learn more about Keith's ongoing health issues and why it took two years for the bullet in his neck to finally be removed -- plus, a few details about Keith and Kelly's wedding vows.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Best Fiends and Vistaprint.

Download Best Fiends for FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play.

www.Vistaprint.com/Undisclosed
